title: Diamond & Emerald Lakshmi Haaram with South Sea Pearls - A Timeless Classic
materials: South Sea Pearls. Crafted with a signature Hyderabadi Polish for enduring brilliance.
features: This exquisite Lakshmi Haaram features a breathtaking array of meticulously set diamonds in a floral and paisley motif. Adorned with captivating emeralds in prong settings to highlight their natural beauty. The design incorporates traditional South Indian elements with a modern flair. Dazzling natural south sea pearls are gracefully suspended creating a stunning look. This haaram is handcrafted in our Hyderabad studio.
colors: Predominantly gold with a shimmering white diamond sparkle
punctuated by the vibrant green of the emeralds and the soft luster of the pearls.
occasions: or any special occasion demanding a touch of regal elegance. Also ideal for formal galas and red carpet events.
description: This Lakshmi Haaram is a true investment piece that embodies timeless beauty and cultural significance. The combination of high-quality diamonds, genuine emeralds, and South Sea pearls ensures exceptional value and enduring appeal. Its meticulous craftsmanship and traditional design make it a treasured heirloom to be passed down through generations. The radiant Hyderabadi polish accentuates its brilliance and ensures a lasting shine.
